endpoints.description: Retrieve the current inventory status, including quantities and locations of items.
Submit a request to restock specific items based on demand predictions.
Analyze and report purchasing trends and seasonal patterns.
Provide forecast data for inventory requirements based on historical data.
Retrieve detailed waste reports to identify inefficiencies.
Adjust inventory levels manually after verification by staff.
List all suppliers and their associated products.
Create a new order for inventory replenishment.
Remove specific items from inventory upon confirmation.
Retrieve KPIs and other metrics related to inventory optimization.
